function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective monitoring of infectious diseases in the population.","Impact":"Increased spread of infectious diseases and difficulty in controlling pandemics.","Mitigation":"Implement effective monitoring and tracking systems for early detection and containment of infectious diseases.","Technologies":"AI satellites, mobile-based apps, drones, GPS, Bluetooth.","People":"General population, patients, individuals at risk of infectious diseases.","Owner":"Governments, private sectors, healthcare organizations, technology companies."}]}
